${modID}:build.NAME: Build
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:swarf.NAME: Swarf
${modID}:swarf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Build a ${modID}:Steel. NL ${modID}:Consume the [#d4ff00]Program[].

${modID}:collect.NAME: Collect
${modID}:collect.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each Automaton in play.

${modID}:tazer.NAME: Tazer
${modID}:tazer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:jack.NAME: Jack of all Trades
${modID}:jack.DESCRIPTION: Build 1 ${modID}:Plastic. NL Build 1 ${modID}:Wooden. NL Build 1 ${modID}:Steel. NL Exhaust.
